88.heading: Bumstead, Alexander.

90.heading: Bumstead, Alexander.

93.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.

94.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.
94.title: "From Now On, I'm Going to Cultivate Weeds and I'll Pull Out Any Grass that Grows"
94.author: Young & Drake.

95.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.
95.title: "He's Home Right Now Cooking Dinner"
95.author: Young & Drake
95.appears_in: p. 103 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Blondie's friend has three degrees and runs a corporation, and Blondie's impressed: I guess we've seen the last of 'dumb blondes.' Her friend says no, she's married to one.

96.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.
96.title: "I Forgot What I Did"
96.author: Young & Drake
96.appears_in: p. 5 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Blondie's not speaking to Dagwood until he admits he was wrong.

97.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.
97.title: "I'll Be Glad When They Get This Little Spat Patched Up"
97.author: by Dean Young
97.appears_in: p. 84 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Because of a fight Tootsie comes next door to sleep with Blondie; Herb rings the doorbell and punches Dagwood, and Dagwood retires to the sofa with a black eye.

98.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.
98.title: "I'll Go Back in Five Minutes and Try Again"
98.author: by Dean Young and Stan Drake
98.appears_in: p. 106 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Blondie has a surprising new hairdo. Dagwood screams and she cries every time he sees it.

99.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.
99.title: "Stick with the Flowers"
99.author: Young & Lebrun.
notes: Summary: In bed with Blondie, Dagwood describes the nicest part of his day in terms of hugs and flowers, then remembers the pork chops.
Key word: Bedrooms.

100.heading: Bumstead, Blondie.
100.title: "Well, How Do You Think I Feel?"
100.author: by Dean Young
100.appears_in: p. 30 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Herb comes home early from a business trip and gets in bed with Dagwood, while Blondie and Tootsie are in bed together next door.

101.heading: Bumstead, Cookie.
101.title: "If My Letter is Rated 'G' Would They Read It?"
101.author: by Dean Young and Denis Lebrun.
notes: Summary: The movie industry thinks people won't watch movies without bad language, and Cookie thinks about writing a letter to complain.

102.heading: Bumstead, Dagwood.

103.heading: Bumstead, Dagwood.

103.author: Young & Drake.

105.heading: Bumstead, Dagwood.

106.heading: Bumstead, Dagwood.

106.author: by Dean Young & Stan Drake
106.appears_in: p. 104 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
